name: Magnect
description:
Magnect is a platforming game in which you'll have to play with two magnetic robots to finish the level!

This game was done for the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2021, following the theme Joined Together.

Controls
  • E button: Attract your friend
  • Left click: Grab your friend
  • Right click: Switch with your friend
  • WASD: Move along the level
